data.message: Been a fan for a long time. Won't be anymore. Trump is fixing America - making people responsible for their own mess, which is logical, fair and right. So no - can't support Trump bashers. Bye

replies.message:
Farida De Villers
You are right , he is making people stand accountable for their own doings . Some people here & around the world don't want to admit it but we are seeing america making a come back & that is something we have not seen in good many years . I still have high hopes for africa 🌍😊
I wish any of this was true, but its not.
The only thing he's doing is tweeting and dragging everyone into a world war. I hope trump supporters all enlist to fight
but you supported him when he bashed bush? who was a better president then Trump

Le monde entier vous adore pour votre bêtise. Votre président tue les hommes, les animaux et même ce qui n'est pas vivant comme le respect et l'intelligence. Le président français et tous les autres dictateurs également.. vous n'êtes qu' une minorité très expressive et bruyante comme la bêtise. Bientôt ca va changé :) mon dieu à moi c'est la patience.
I'm sure Eminem really minds what you type while he sits with his millions....
Uh if your so over em , what in the fuck are you doing on one of his post?
45 isn't doing shit. His fiscal year just started. You are loving what Obama did.
James Joyner You are both wrong, Trump is a horrible president and person. Eminem speaks the truth and he has always been awesome, but even more so now
